title: New Holland Agriculture Publicly Launches the Industry's First All-Electric Utility Tractor with Autonomous Features ... - PR Newswire
summary: New Holland Agriculture introduces the T4 Electric Power, an all-electric utility tractor with autonomous features, designed for sustainable zero emission farming for 2024, promising better performance than diesel and addressing challenges in farming operations.
green_innovation: TRUE. This is a green innovation as it introduces sustainable, zero-emission farming practices with the launch of an all-electric utility tractor that aims to promote environmental sustainability and reduce negative environmental externalities of farming activities.
business_innovation: TRUE. This is a business innovation as New Holland Agriculture is introducing a new class of utility tractor, the T4 Electric Power, which differs significantly from its previous products by being all-electric with autonomous features, appealing to a new market segment.
green_product: TRUE. This is a green product as the T4 Electric Power tractor is designed to significantly reduce its environmental impact throughout its life cycle by being all-electric, emission-free, and promoting sustainable agriculture practices.
green_process: TRUE. This is a green process as the T4 Electric Power tractor's manufacturing process aims to minimize environmental impacts and promote sustainability by utilizing renewable resources, reducing energy consumption, and limiting harmful substance releases.
likely_naics_codes: Likely NAICS Codes: 111211 - Potato Farming, 115116 - Farm Machinery and Equipment Manufacturing, 111998 - All Other Miscellaneous Crop Farming, 333111 - Farm Machinery and Equipment Manufacturing
greenwashing: FALSE. The article does not exhibit greenwashing as it provides detailed and factual information about the environmental benefits and features of the T4 Electric Power tractor without misleading or exaggerating its sustainability attributes.
